thread.title: Starbucks Can Hire All The Refugees It Wants, Its Competition Vowed To Hire 10 Thousand Veterans

title: Starbucks Can Hire All The Refugees It Wants, Its Competition Vowed To Hire 10 Thousand Veterans
text:
Starbucks Can Hire All The Refugees It Wants, Its Competition Vowed To Hire 10 Thousand Veterans Published February 3, 2017 Facebook 0 Twitter 0 livefyre 0 Email Print 
By Michael Dorstewitz, BizPac Review 
Ever left-leaning Starbucks has stirred up a fresh reason for a new boycott. Howard Schultz, the coffee giantâ€™s CEO, announced plans to hire 10,000 refugees to work in its restaurants. But its competition has a better idea.
